channel.title: Gmaul Spec Hits Only One Hit!

item.title: Gmaul Spec Hits Only One Hit!
item.dc:creator: @h4ckingYOURLife h4ckingYOURLife
item.description:
@h4ckingYOURLife wrote:

The specail under

void specialAtk

if(hitTwice && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4153){ getHit(0); } if(hitTwice && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153){//gmaul spec players if(!GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){ return; } getHit(8); }

in clickingmost

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4153 && c.specialAmount > 49 && c.IsAttacking){ c.specialAtk(true, 50, 340, 1667); c.hitDiff = misc.random(c.playerMaxHit) + misc.random(c.StrPrayer); } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4153 && c.specialAmount > 49 && c.IsAttackingNPC){ c.specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 340, 1667); c.hitDiff = misc.random(c.playerMaxHit) + misc.random(c.StrPrayer); } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 4153 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 1377) { c.specOn = !c.specOn; } c.specAttack(); } catch (Exception ex) { }

btw im using a delta based server

Read full topic
item.source: Gmaul Spec Hits Only One Hit!
